name: Turned based car race
description:
Race against your opponent, and be the first to complete a lap. Made for the triple-trijam https://itch.io/jam/triple-trijam-2020

  • player 1 controls:  "A, D" to turn 
  • player 2 controls:  "J, L" to turn

turning your car will make you stop. Release the key to start driving again

Made in roughly 4 hours. The game is a bit buggy, but I was able to learn more about Excalibur, which was my main goal for this challenge.

Source code: https://github.com/johnedvard/triple-trijam
